hello: Hello and welcome to this i18n example site!
subline: You can read some of my cool articles I wrote!
copyrightContent: Animers Â© 2020. Built by Karl Bruder & Mipon

faqs.question: When's the next event?
faqs.answer: The next event is on MM/DD at TT:TT

faqs.question: Where is the next event being held?
faqs.answer: The next event will be held at @@@

faqs.question: How do I register for events?
faqs.answer: You can sign up on our Meetup page: www.aaa.com

faqs.question: I can't speak Japanese/English. Can I still join?
faqs.answer: Sure! Many members can speak both, so you'll be able to enjoy the event.

faqs.question: Can I show up without registering?
faqs.answer: Sorry, but please register in advance, as there is limited space.

faqs.question: Is this event exclusive to Tokyo residents?
faqs.answer: No. Anyone is free to join.

faqs.question: Are you holding events during the pandemic?
faqs.answer: Not currently, but we are planning safe, outdoor events. Stay tuned!

faqs.question: How many people do you allow at events?
faqs.answer: Right now, we limit events to 8 people.

faqs.question: I don't drink alcohol. Can I still join?
faqs.answer: Sure! The all-you-can-drink service is optional.

faqs.question: Do I have to pay full price if I don't drink alcohol?
faqs.answer: No, we will deduct @@@ yen from your admission price.

advantages.title: People that work in the anime industry usually come to the event
Practice your English and/or Japanese skills
Everyone in the Community is Very Welcoming

about.title: About Animers
about.description: Animers is a bi-monthly, bilingual (English & Japanese) event for anime & manga fans in Tokyo. Our creed is to create community where everyone can have a sense of belonging and respected.

creed.title: Animers Creed
creed.description: A community where everyone can have a sense of belonging and respected.
